syllabus:
1\. In this course, we are going to study a dozen Shakespearean plays, adaptations, and related scholarly articles.

2\. Our major textbook is: Stephen Greenblatt, ed., The Norton Shakespeare, Based on the Oxford Edition. New York: Norton, 2008.

3\. A detailed schedule is to be discussed and decided after orientation in the first week. It will normally be announced in the class in the second week of the term.

grading.note: 1. Regular attendance is expected.  2. Every absence may result in three points being deducted from the final grade average.  3. Active class participation and a ten-page final paper in MLA format are required.
